mapper.insert: insert into module_score (module_score_id, stu_no, module_id, point, module_score_status) values (#{moduleScoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moduleScoreStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select module_score_id, stu_no, module_id, point, module_score_status from module_score
